The stunning sequin eye design adds a touch of sparkle to your casual look, making you stand out in any crowd.

Whether you’re lounging at the beach, strolling through a seaside market, or enjoying a relaxed brunch with friends, this shirt dress adapts to any casual setting. The button-up design makes it easy to layer over your swimsuit, providing sun protection without compromising on style.
